examples: Can I count on your loyalty?

Companies are eager to build brand loyalty in their customers (= to keep them buying the same brand).
Las empresas están ansiosas por generar lealtad a la marca en sus clientes (= mantenerlos comprando la misma marca).
a case of divided loyalties (= with strong feelings of support for two different causes, people, etc.)
un caso de lealtades divididas (= con fuertes sentimientos de apoyo a dos causas diferentes, personas, etc.)
